item.title: CVE-2024-30198|2024-03-27T06:16:47.590Z -- themekraft -- buddyforms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemeKraft BuddyForms allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects BuddyForms: from n/a through 2.8.5.
